attributes.action: cut footballers wages to go in line with the average persons wage and get rewarded if they win
attributes.additional_details: Why do proffessional footballers deserve to be earning such high wages most people have to work hard all year to get what they receive in a week.  It should be capped at a low amount and if they win they get a bonus.  Then maybe the England football team might actually put some effort into winning something for their country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities.
